name: Midwinter Memory: An Ardency Story
description:
Experience a memorable holiday back in time twelve years before the events of Ardency: Heart of the Rebellion with your best friend, Claudin.

See how this Midwinter celebration became a core memory for some of the Ardency characters!

Created for the Winter Visual Novel Jam 2022
